author: rich
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-252 : Forward with a returnAction set still required for an nested pageflow to compile even it presents in its parent class
Also, fixed to avoid trying to generate Struts config files for page flows whose base classes contain errors.

author: skitching
msg: Changes due to merging of Declaration init method into constructor.

author: skitching
msg: Minor changes due to removal of Declaration.init method
(all initialisation now done in Declaration constructor).

author: skitching
msg: * more findLoader method to here from PluginDeclarationScope
* perform all initialisation in constructor(s) rather than
have a separate init method: much cleaner.
